items: M&A pipeline at highest level since 2021, signaling strong deal activity and investment banking momentum.
Backlog increased for the fourth consecutive quarter, indicating sustained client demand and business growth.
Client dialogues remain elevated, reflecting strong engagement despite macroeconomic uncertainty.
Some clients adopting a wait-and-see approach due to ongoing macro environment uncertainty, impacting near-term decision-making.
Trading revenue strong across both fixed income and equities, driven by increased client activity and market volatility.
Trading desk benefited from client repositioning amid volatile markets, enhancing revenue opportunities.
Expect significant M&A activity for the remainder of the year as companies pursue growth opportunities.
Investment banking activity continues to strengthen, supporting overall revenue growth.
Macro environment uncertainty remains a concern but has not dampened overall client engagement and pipeline strength.
Sustained elevated client engagement and backlog growth demonstrate resilience in business operations despite external challenges.
